title: LEGO Harry Potter Hogwarts Castle: The Main Tower - Interactive Castle Toy with Modular Flying Key & Wizard Chess Rooms, plus 12 Minifigures - Gift for 10+ Year Old Boys, Girls & Adult Fans 76454
features: Hogwarts Castle building set – This LEGO Harry Potter castle toy for 10+ year old boys and girls lets fans build an iconic Hogwarts scene, with a main tower that connects to the Great Hall (76535, sold separately)

12 LEGO Harry Potter minifigures – Including Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Neville Longbottom, Professor Kettleburn, Nearly Headless Nick and Albus Dumbledore, plus Fluffy, Hedwig and Fawkes figures

Interactive toy with authentic details – Features a trapdoor escape from Fluffy’s room, trigger-activated Devil’s Snare, Flying Keys function, swivelling Grand Staircase to Dumbledore’s office, the Mirror of Erised, and more

Castle building set – The Flying Keys and Wizard Chess rooms in the castle’s rocky foundations are removable and can be swapped with other modular rooms; includes 6 of 14 collectible Hogwarts portraits
Harry Potter-themed gift for kids – This LEGO Hogwarts Castle set makes a magical gift for 10+ year old boys, girls, and fans of the Wizarding World and building toys
Intuitive instructions – The LEGO Builder app gives kids interactive tools that let them zoom in and rotate models in 3D, track their progress and save their LEGO Harry Potter sets
Fun collectible – This LEGO Harry Potter building toy is part of a series of modular sets (sold separately) that connect to form the most detailed buildable Hogwarts Castle scene yet
description: From the manufacturer Gift for Harry Potter fans A magical toy castle playset for kids This tremendous LEGO Harry Potter Hogwarts Castle building set features the biggest minifigure-scale model (at launch) of The Main Tower and is packed with authentic details to excite every Harry Potter fan. Unique LEGO Harry Potter set Relive classic scenes, tell enchanting new stories This 2,135-piece building set offers a spellbinding creative challenge and hours of role-play adventures with 12 LEGO Harry Potter minifigures, plus Fluffy, Hedwig and Fawkes figures. Previous page Trapdoor Escape from Fluffy’s room through the trapdoor. Trigger-activated Devil’s Snare Break free from the Devil’s Snare. Enchanted keys Chase keys in the enchanted keys room. Dumbledore’s office Tell the Griffin the password and walk up the swivelling Grand Staircase to Dumbledore’s office. Mirror of Erised Look into the Mirror of Erised. 12 LEGO Harry Potter minifigures Includes Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Neville Longbottom, Dean Thomas, Lisa Turpin, Professor Kettleburn, Nearly Headless Nick and Albus Dumbledore. Next page LEGO Builder 3D building instructions Add a little extra magic to kids’ creative experience with the intuitive LEGO Builder app, which lets them zoom in and rotate their model in 3D while they build, track progress and save sets. Fun collectible sets Explore the buildable Hogwarts Castle collection This LEGO Harry Potter toy is part of a collection of modular sets (sold separately) that connect to create what is, at launch, the most detailed brick-built Hogwarts Castle scene yet. Previous page Hogwarts Castle: Charms Class Join Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley in a charms class with this enchanting kids’ playset, featuring a Wingardium Leviosa feather-levitation function. Hogwarts Castle: Herbology Class Role-play as students learning how to nurture Mandrakes and other magical plants at a Hogwarts Castle Herbology class with this building set for kids. Book Nook: Hogwarts Express Bring wizardry to kids’ room decor with the first-ever LEGO Harry Potter book nook, featuring a buildable section of the Hogwarts Express train. Quality Quidditch Supplies & Ice Cream Parlour Let your young wizard, witch or Muggle join Ron Weasley and Cho Chang for a magical shopping trip in Diagon Alley. Next page
